name: Sample GDPR Compliance Template
description: A sample template for GDPR compliance requirements

rules.name: Data Encryption
rules.rule: All personal data must be encrypted at rest and in transit

rules.name: Data Retention
rules.rule: Personal data must not be kept longer than necessary

sections.name: User Rights
sections.description: Implementation of user rights under GDPR

rules.name: Right to Access
rules.rule: Users must be able to access their personal data

rules.name: Right to Deletion
rules.rule: Users must be able to request deletion of their data
